name: ShockJump
description:
Someboy, not us, screwed up. And now, the bugs are out of the containment area. A new nest has been established somewhere in the region and we're going to take it out.

And you're the bait.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look
  • Space to jump, wall jump by moving towards a wall
  • Shift to dash, be sure you don't overheat
  • Control to crouch, jumping from a crouch is a high jump.
